long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snapshot of Stock Performance While You Browse
Get instant stock performance data for any company you come across while browsing, without the need for additional searches.

ü§î Ever been reading about a company and wanted to quickly check its stock performance?
ü§î Ever seen a company name in an article and found yourself searching for stock fundamentals on Finviz, Morningstar, or other stock apps?

There's no need for extra web searches or time-wasting. Save your time and get immediate stock performance insights as soon as you encounter a company name or ticker online!

‚ö°Ô∏è How does our extension help investors?
Our extension allows investors to quickly check stock performance information whenever they come across a company name in news articles, web pages, or any other online content. No more searching or navigating to other websites‚Äîsave valuable time with instant access.

üî® How does it work?
The extension automatically identifies company names and stock tickers on any webpage you have open in your browser. It highlights these names and tickers, and when you hover your mouse over them, a popup appears displaying key data about the company's stock performance.
